[00:00.00]Blue Tacoma - Russell Dickerson
[00:01.26]Written by：Casey Brown/Russell Dickerson/Parker Welling/Stephen Harris/Leighton Hicks/Tyler Barksdale
[00:02.53]Blue Tacoma California
[00:04.79]
[00:08.44]Rays of gold are shining on ya
[00:10.90]
[00:14.81]Wheels rolling on an old Toyota
[00:17.81]Twist top on a Sunkist soda
[00:20.59]Your brown hair in the west coast wind
[00:23.97]If heaven is anywhere
[00:26.64]The night is here it's at the top of our lungs
[00:29.82]Shuffling in and gonna steal the one
[00:32.73]Missing turns cause that's our song
[00:35.38]
[00:36.00]If heaven is anywhere
[00:37.88]It's in a blue Tacoma California
[00:40.79]
[00:41.38]White magnolia in your hair
[00:44.43]Rays of gold are shining on ya
[00:47.07]Oooh if heaven is anywhere
[00:50.11]It's never running out of golden road
[00:53.78]Always having your hand to hold
[00:56.09]In a blue Tacoma California
[00:58.93]Oooh if heaven is anywhere
[01:01.91]It's right through the door California
[01:05.08]
[01:08.41]Rays of gold are shining on ya
[01:10.99]
[01:14.81]Red sun melting to the black top
[01:17.78]Dollar shades from a nowhere truck stop
[01:20.78]Your kiss and that coast line
[01:23.91]If heaven is anywhere
[01:26.85]Pull it over to the shoulder
[01:29.59]To take it in
[01:30.62]Mmmh and pull you closer
[01:32.62]Loving you longer than I ever did
[01:35.04]Going places we never been
[01:37.18]Cause heaven's in
[01:38.32]A blue Tacoma California
[01:40.77]
[01:41.41]White magnolia in your hair
[01:44.48]Rays of gold are shining on ya
[01:47.11]Oooh if heaven is anywhere
[01:49.98]It's never running out of golden road
[01:53.75]Always having your hand to hold
[01:56.11]In a blue Tacoma California
[01:59.06]Oooh if heaven is anywhere
[02:01.93]It's right here
[02:03.26]

[02:16.75]

[02:23.03]

data.trans:
[ti:Blue Tacoma]
[ar:Russell Dickerson]
[al:Yours]
[by:]

[00:00.00]//
[00:01.26]//
[00:02.53]蓝色塔科马 加利福尼亚
[00:04.79]
[00:08.44]你身上散发出闪闪金光
[00:10.90]
[00:14.81]开着旧丰田车一路驰骋
[00:17.81]开一瓶新奇士汽水
[00:20.59]你棕色的秀发随西海岸的风儿飞扬
[00:23.97]如果真有天堂存在
[00:26.64]今夜就在这里 这就是我们快乐的巅峰
[00:29.82]慢慢靠近彼此 俘获对方的真心
[00:32.73]忘了加转音也无妨 因为这是我们的专属歌谣
[00:35.38]
[00:36.00]如果真有天堂存在
[00:37.88]那它就在加州的一辆蓝色塔科马里
[00:40.79]
[00:41.38]在你秀发间插一朵白玉兰
[00:44.43]你身上散发出闪闪金光
[00:47.07]如果真有天堂存在
[00:50.11]那这条黄金大道将永远没有尽头
[00:53.78]一切尽在你的掌控中
[00:56.09]在加州的一辆蓝色塔科马里
[00:58.93]如果真有天堂存在
[01:01.91]穿过那扇门 加州就会出现在你眼前
[01:05.08]
[01:08.41]你身上散发出闪闪金光
[01:10.99]
[01:14.81]当红日融入夜幕当中
[01:17.78]卡车停靠站里尽是金钱买卖
[01:20.78]你在海岸线边吻了我
[01:23.91]如果真有天堂存在
[01:26.85]那就把它扛在肩上
[01:29.59]让它融入心间
[01:30.62]把你拉近一点
[01:32.62]我比以往都更爱你
[01:35.04]去未曾踏足的远方游荡
[01:37.18]因为天堂就在
[01:38.32]加州的一辆蓝色塔科马里
